text.resourcefulconfig.clearwater.config: Clear Water is a mod that allows you to fully control the fog settings of Water, Lava, and even Powdered Snow!
text.resourcefulconfig.clearwater.option: Enable water fog control
Enables modifications of fog under water
Fog start (Water)
Value for where fog starts. Vanilla is -8.0
Fog end (Water)
Value for where fog ends. Vanilla is 96.0
Fade-in water fog
When enabled, makes vision fade in like vanilla behavior
Respect HAS_CLOSER_FOG_WATER biome tag
When enabled, reduces fog distance if player is in a biome in the HAS_CLOSER_FOG_WATER biome tag. This reduces fog distance by 15%.
Fog shape (Water)
The shape of the fog around the player
Enable lava fog control
Enables modifications of fog under lava
Fog start (Lava)
Value for where fog starts. Vanilla is 0.25
Fog end (Lava)
Value for where fog ends. Vanilla is 1.0
Fog shape (Lava)
The shape of the fog around the player
Enable powdered snow fog control
Enables modifications of fog under powdered snow
Fog start (Powdered Snow)
Value for where fog starts. Vanilla is 0.0
Fog end (Powdered Snow)
Value for where fog ends. Vanilla is 2.0
Fog shape (Powdered Snow)
The shape of the fog around the player
